briefTitle: Persistent Pain After Reconstruction Following Mastectomy
officialTitle: Persistent Pain After Reconstruction Following Mastectomy
primaryOutcomeMeasure: The risk of developing persistent if reconstructed
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Patients with unilateral primary breast cancer aged 18-70 years

Exclusion Criteria:

* recurrent cancer
* other malignancy
* emigration
* non-standardized treatment
